code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function NavigationBar(_ref){let{brandName,imageSrcPath,navItems}=_ref;const[selectedIndex,setSelectedIndex]=useState(-1);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"navbar navbar-expand-md navbar-light bg-white shadow",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-fluid",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("a",{className:"navbar-brand",href:"#",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:imageSrcPath,width:"60",height:"60",className:"d-inline-block align-center me-2",alt:""}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"fw-bolder fs-4",children:brandName})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"navbar-toggler",type:"button","data-bs-toggle":"collapse","data-bs-target":"#navbarSupportedContent","aria-controls":"navbarSupportedContent","aria-expanded":"false","aria-label":"Toggle navigation",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"navbar-toggler-icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"collapse navbar-collapse",id:"navbarSupportedContent",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"navbar-nav me-auto mb-2 mb-md-1",children:navItems.map((item,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{className:`nav-item ${selectedIndex===index?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>setSelectedIndex(index),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{className:"nav-link",href:"#",children:item})},index))})})]})});}export default NavigationBar;
